page.title: 15HEALTH
page.content: HOSPITAL CONTINUED REHABILITATION PROGRAMMES ENABLE PATIENTS TO LEAD PARTIALLY NORMAL LIVES.COOKING FACILITIES IN FLATS ,GARDENING ,SHOPPING AND HELPING ON THE FARM ARE ALL ACTIVITIES USED TO HELP THE PATIENTS.THERE ARE 314 NURSES EMPLOYED TO CARE FOR ALL THE PATIENTS.THEY WORK ON SHIFTS; DAY SHIFT 7.25 - 9.00,NIGHT SHIFT 9.00 - 7.30 AM.THERE ARE VARIOUS GRADES IN THE NURSING PROFESSION AND THE HOSPITAL EMPLOYS MANY NURSES WHO ARE SPECIALLY TRAINED.SOME NURSES LIVE IN AND AROUND THE HOSPITAL AND SEND THEIR CHILDREN TO STRATHMARTINE PRIMARY SCHOOL.OTHER STAFF EMPLOYED WORK, IN THE KITCHEN ,LAUNDRY AND GROUNDS IN GENERAL MAINTENANCE.THERE IS A SCHOOL WITHIN THE HOSPITAL WHERE THE PATIENTS ARE TAUGHT TO TRY TO COPE FOR THEMSELVES IN VARIED WAYS.
